long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powered by learnenglishmentor.com, the AI platform to learn English online, English Pronouncer is a browser extension that enhances your English language experience by providing instant access to accurate pronunciation and translations. Whether you're learning English, traveling, or just want to understand the language better, this extension is here to assist you.

‚ùóNote: As English Pronouncer is a newly published extension, you might see a warning that it is not yet trusted by Enhanced Safe Browsing. This is a standard message for new extensions and will disappear once our extension has gained enough positive feedback and trust from the community. We assure you that English Pronouncer is safe and secure to use. ‚ùó

With English Pronouncer, you can:

üîä Listen to Pronunciation: Simply select a word or phrase and click the icon that appears, and you'll hear the correct English pronunciation.

üìñ Translate Text: Choose a language, and the extension will translate the selected English text for you, bridging language barriers effortlessly.

‚öôÔ∏è Customize Your Experience: Now available in 8 different languages, the settings menu allows you to tailor the extension to fit your needs.

The extension is intuitive, reliable, and an invaluable tool for anyone engaging with the English language. Speak and understand English with confidence, thanks to English Pronouncer.
